reviews.text: Tried the new  @lupitasmexicancuisine on the southside, great looking space  ! Enjoyed our Sunday afternoon chatting with the owner, Eduardo, at the bar,...

Fantastic atmosphere. By far the best Mexican food in south columbus. I would recommend it to anyone.
